goals__remit:
To look after and further the joint economic, professional, technical and scientific interests of members. 
 
To speak a single voice for the fastener manufacturing industry in Europe. 
 
To continually raise our profile to the highest possible level for the benefit of members and European fasteners industry. 
 
To provide members companies with the opportunities to meet and exchange practical experiences, ideas and information, not only with other fastener manufacturers but also customers, suppliers, and others involved in the supply-chain. 
 
To forge close relashionships with similar organisations, including the North American Industrial Fasteners Institute (IFI), the Fasteners Institute of Japan (FIJ) and the European Fastener Distributors Association (EFDA)... 
 
EIFI also has close links with the EU Commission in Brussels and with many other purchase and supply companies and representative bodies throughout Europe.
relevant_communication: EIFI ESPECIALLY FOLLOWS TRADE DEFENCE POLICY AND ALSO FOLLOWS POLICIES THAT ARE RELEVANT FOR BUSINESS IN PARTICULAR SMI
